title: England's Henry Moore
brief_description: A look at the life and works of one of England’s most prolific and famous sculptors, Henry Moore who became well known for his ‘reclining women’. The film uses old footage and includes interviews with Helmut Schmidt, Sir Stephen Spender, Lord Callaghan and Jill Craigie.
